titleStmt.title: By the mayor whereas by neglect of executing the good lawes and statutes against rogues, vagabonds, and sturdy beggars ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Second part of title taken from first two lines of text.
"Dated the twenty third day of Janaury 1655.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
